fileSystem.pageSubtitle: Manage storage, sharing, and access across your organization.

landing.storageContentManagementSubtitle: Online storage, shared files, document control, and electronic document management.

dcs.subtitle: Document Control System.
dcs.placeholder: Details to be advised in a later document version.

edms.subtitle: Electronic Document Management System.
edms.placeholder: Details to be advised in a later document version.

systemAdmin.title: System Storage Management (SSM)
systemAdmin.description: Manage virtual drives, list and manage file systems when you have Entity Admin on the drive, and monitor storage and traffic.

entityAdmin.title: Entity Storage Management (ESM)
entityAdmin.description: Manage virtual drives and file systems owned by the entity, sync with local storage, monitor storage and traffic, and manage storage settings and access rights.
entityAdmin.virtualDrivesOwned: Virtual Drives owned by the Entity
entityAdmin.fileSystemsHostedInDrives: File systems hosted in drives owned by the entity.
entityAdmin.syncDescription: Sync local folder with remote storage (Up / Down / Full Sync).
entityAdmin.entityStorageSettingsDescription: Control whether entity users can share files internally or externally.
entityAdmin.allowShareInternally: Allow entity users to share files internally
entityAdmin.allowShareExternally: Allow entity users to share files externally
entityAdmin.sharingExpiryDescription: Set default expiry for shared file system links.
entityAdmin.trafficDescription: Uploads, downloads, and file traffic for owned virtual drives.
entityAdmin.noOwnedDrives: No virtual drives owned by the entity.

fileSharing.title: Shared File Systems (SFS)
fileSharing.description: Create and manage your own shared file systems (when entity settings allow), copy from main file systems, share via links, and manage access and expiry.
fileSharing.copyFromMainDescription: Copy files or folders from main (entity) file systems into a shared file system.
fileSharing.accessLinksDescription: Provide links to shared file systems. Links are accessible to system guests.
fileSharing.manageAccessAndExpiryDescription: Set who can view or edit and set link expiry.
fileSharing.sharedWithYou: Files and folders shared with you

companyStorageView.title: Online Storage File Systems (OSFS)
companyStorageView.description: List virtual drives owned by the entity, then select a drive and a file system to manage folders and files and upload or download.
companyStorageView.selectDriveAndFileSystem: Select a virtual drive and then a file system to manage folders and files.

companyStorage.uploadDialogHint: Upload area â€“ UI only. No file upload functionality.
companyStorage.confirmDeleteFolder: Remove this folder and all its contents?
companyStorage.recycleBinDescription: Deleted folders and files. Restore or clear.

admin.syncDescription: Sync local folder with remote storage. Under development.
admin.selectDriveToManageFileSystems: Select a drive above to list and manage file systems.
admin.createFileSystemRequiresEntityAdmin: Create and manage file systems only when you have Entity Admin role on the selected drive.
admin.trafficDescription: Total uploads, downloads, and file traffic across virtual drives.

messages.resetInfo: Settings have been reset to default values
